{{zh-see|中國}}

----

==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ちゅう|こく|k2=ごく|yomi=o|r=y}}

===Etymology===
From [[中]] (ちゅう, chū, "the middle") + [[国]] (こく, koku, "country").

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|ちゅうごく|acc=a|acc2=h|acc_ref=SMK5|acc2_ref=DJR|y=o|a=Ja-Chugoku.ogg}}

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|ちゅうごく|proper|kyu=中國}}

# [[China]] {{qualifier|the [[Asia]]n country}}
# [[Chugoku]] [[area]] (the [[west]] [[area]] of [[Japan]]) (includes {{l|ja|鳥取県}}, {{l|ja|島根県}}, {{l|ja|岡山県}}, {{l|ja|広島県}}, {{l|ja|山口県}})

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|country}} {{ja-r|中華人民共和国|^ちゅうか ^じんみん ^きょうわこく}}: [[People's Republic of China]]

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|中国語|ちゅうごくご}}: Chinese language
* {{ja-r|中国人|ちゅうごくじん}}: Chinese people, Chinese person
* {{ja-r|中国料理|^ちゅうごく りょうり}} Chinese cuisine
* {{ja-r|中国地方|^ちゅうごく ちほう}}: the Chugoku-area (in Japan)

{{catlangcode|ja|China|Countries of Asia|sort=ちゅうこく'}}
